actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the printing of a report entitled, "The Superpowers at a Crossroads: Soviet-American Relations in the Autumn of 1985--Report by the Senate Delegation to Hungary and the Soviet Union Led by Senators Robert C. Byrd and Strom Thurmond August 27--September 6, 1985".

summary.text: Authorizes an additional printing of "The Superpowers at a Crossroads: Soviet-American Relations in the Autumn of 1985-Report by a Senate Delegation to Hungary and the Soviet Union led by Senators Robert C. Byrd and Strom Thurmond, August 27-September 6, 1985" as an official Senate document.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the printing of a report entitled, "The Superpowers at a Crossroads: Soviet-American Relations in the Autumn of 1985--Report by the Senate Delegation to Hungary and the Soviet Union Led by Senators Robert C. Byrd and Strom Thurmond August 27--September 6, 1985".
